name: The Rooftops
description:
Water, plant and harvest your crops in a seemingly desolate high rise city.  Sell your harvest to customers with help a handy drone and don't forget check the corner of your eye for what's lurking in the shadows.

This game was made during brackeys 2022 one week game jam and it was made with Unreal engine 4.26. Also, all the modelling was done by me.

Credits:

Music-Olexy from pixabay.

Water SFX- Quistard.

Wind SFX-Florianreichelt.

Bell ding SFX-Inspectorj.

Harvest SFX-Jofae.

Additonal SFX- Interface and item sounds by Daydream Sound from Unreal marketplace.
